short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds background images to Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modify the Google Calendar UI to include full-page background images or colors.
Use your own images, or purchase from sets of provided themes.

For support, see: https://github.com/padster/CalendarThemeExtension/issues

**Note** Calendar recently added a dark mode. Support is coming, but for now if wanting to use the extension, it is recommended you use light mode, and instead set a 'dark overlay' in the extension's settings page.
